Title: TypograFix
Description: HTML re-processing script for typographic beautification. Written in C#.
HomeWiki:
This project is hosted on BitBucket and is NOT UPDATED on CodePlex.


Project Description
HTML re-processing script for typographic beautification. Written in C#.


Features

 

  • Stand-alone WPF application. Useful for preparing HTML materials for publication (e.g., on CodeProject).
  • BlogEngine.net extension. Prettifies your blog posts. Decided that BlogEngine.net is not a good blogging platform and supporting it is pointless :(
